Posts.Content: Aug 21, 2013 12:30AM ShanaDana wrote: Hi Sharon,  I get what you are dealing with.  I too, have lately been feeling lumpy nodule-like growths under my Tram side breast mound.  Lots of discomfort lately and concern over what this lumpy node like things are.  All around the perimeter where the breast cancer was scooped out. And under the arms  I feel the same thing.  lumpy hard nodule and slightly painful..Just wondering if the is a progression rearing it's ugly head or scar tissue around the area where nodes were removed. I'm thinking of letting it go a few more weeks with my onc visit coming up.  I worry about everything in these areas with obvious physical issues
Posts.Title: New Concerns Popping Up pupfoster1 pupfoster1
